long_description: Running indoors or just can't get a satellite signal? Use this wireless foot pod with your Garmin Forerunner(TM) fitness trainer or heart rate monitor to track your speed and distance. Smaller, lighter and more accurate than the previous version, the foot pod is ideal for indoor tracks, treadmills and anywhere you can't get GPS satellite signals. Accurately reports distance when walking, jogging or sprinting; for even higher accuracy, calibrate the foot pod to adjust for your personal stride. Foot pod is small enough to attach to shoelaces or fit in the midsole pocket of compatible shoes. Compatible with Forerunner 210, 305, 310XT, 405, 405CX, 410, 50, 610, 910XT; FR60 and FR70 heart rate monitorsand bundles; ANT+ iPhone(R) adapter; Garmin Fit.
